@King_Lingerz wrote:

Pali’s blank source, I added them in.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2008, 03:51:06 pm[/size][hr]Oh and the shop that dissconnects me prints this on my run.bat:

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 27 at palidino76.rs2.io.Frames.setItems(Frames.java:519) at palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1.handlePacket(NPCOption1.java:372 ) at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.process(Player.java:1380) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:168) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 11:26:18 am[/size][hr]nvm, fixed it on my own… almost. it buys but it won’t value.

item.title: [508] Shops annoying
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Hey, I made a rares shop in my [508], when I talk to Santa it looks like this:

But when I try buy a Party Hat for example, it says

You don’t have enough coins

When I do… And when I value it doesn’t do ANYTHING…

Here is the coding for it:

	public int[] shop6 = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, 1050, 1053, 1055, 1057};
	public int[] shop6n = {100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000};
	public int[] shop6p = {75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000, 75000000};

And in my NPCoption1:


case 145: //Rares
	p.viewings = 1;
		p.shopid = 6;
		p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
		p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop6, p.shop6n);
		p.frames.setString(p, "                                         Santa's Rares Store", 278, 88);
		break;

All my other shops work (except one that disconnects me -.-).

If you could tell me what’s wrong with it and how to/or how to/if I can fix it that would help alot ;D

Read full topic
